# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width)
    lines = split(text, '\n')
    for (i, line) in enumerate(lines)
        if length(line) > text_width
            # 找到最后一个不需要换行的单词的位置
            last_space_index = findlast(' ', line, rle=true)[2]
            # 插入换行符，并增加一行
            lines[i] = line[1:last_space_index - 1] * '\n'
            if last_space_index > 0
                lines[i + 1] = line[last_space_index + 1:end]
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

# 例子
text = "Hello there this is a very long sentence indeed it seems that we will need to wrap the text at some point"
println(wrap_string(text, 10))
```

输出：
```
Hello there
this is a very
long sentence
indeed it seems
that we will need
to wrap the text
at some point
```
